_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four kinds of overflowing merit [an4: Ethical conduct loved by the noble ones
Qualities of a person with faith in the: Faith in the Realized One, unwavering and well grounded
Good ethical conduct, praised and loved by the noble ones
